meanings.definition: Software that automatically displays or downloads advertising material when a user is online.
meanings.sent1: The adware on my computer keeps showing pop-up ads while I browse the internet.
meanings.sent2: I had to remove the adware from my phone because it was slowing down the device.
meanings.sent3: The adware thought it could sneak in ads, but I outsmarted it by uninstalling the program.
meanings.sent4: The adware spread through my computer like a virus, bombarding me with ads at every click.
meanings.sent5: The adware was like a persistent salesman, always trying to sell me something online.

meanings.definition: Malicious software that displays unwanted advertisements on a computer or mobile device.
meanings.sent1: The adware infected my laptop and flooded the screen with annoying ads.
meanings.sent2: It's important to have a good antivirus program to protect against adware.
meanings.sent3: The adware on my phone seemed like a prankster, constantly showing ads at random times.
meanings.sent4: The adware crept into my device like a sneaky thief, stealing my attention with ads.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with adware is like battling a swarm of pesky mosquitoes while trying to work on your computer.
